select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from tb_encode_device
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_encode_device (code, name, org_code, type_code, channel_count, ip_address, stream_port, login_name, login_password, remark, install_address, last_modify_time, vendor_id) values (#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{typeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channelCount,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{ipAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{streamPort,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{installAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{vendorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
